Estate Organizer Tool

Everyone has an estate.

Organizing your estate will bring peace of mind to you and to your heirs. Having a good record will provide an opportunity to have your personal affairs in order. Closing an estate can be a frustrating experience if all the pieces of the puzzle that can comprise estate are not in one place.

You can keep a printed copy of your Estate Organizer in safety deposit box if security is a concern. Once you have filled in the information on your Estate Organizer, chose a memorable date every year...more

Personal Health Insurance

Looking for insurance to protect you and your family? With a wide variety of options, you select the plan, benefits and level of coverage that’s right for you.

Long Term Care Insurance

Estate Organizer offers a complete line-up of life, critical illness, disability, long term care, health and dental and travel insurance products, available through our network of trained, professional advisors. Your advisor can help you build a plan to meet your specific needs.

Travel Insurance

Travel insurance for travelling Canadians gives you a simple, affordable way to protect yourself against the cost of unexpected medical expenses and more, when travelling outside your home province or outside of Canada. With a variety of Single-Trip and Multi-Trip plans to choose from – each offering up to $5 million in emergency medical coverage – you can select the plan that best suits your needs, your travel plans, your travel style and your budget.
